content: crochet drops christmas slippers in snow ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **sizes** child-child-child-woman woman-woman-woman us 4½/6 -7½/9½ -10½/13 -2/4 5/6½ -7½/9 -10/12 eu 22/23 -25/27 -28/31 -32/34 35/37 -38/40 -42/44 foot length 15-17-19-21 23-25-28 cm / 6 -6 3/4 -7½ -8 1/4 9 -9 3/4 -11 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 50-50-50-50 100-100-150 g color no 08 red 50 g for all sizes color no 01 off-white 50 g for all sizes color no 13 tan a remnant of black for eyes for size child 4½ - woman 4 eu 22-34 drops crochet hook 10½/k 7 mm or size needed to get 14 single_crochet = width 10 cm / 4 for size woman 5-12 eu 35-44 drops crochet hook 11/l 8 mm or size needed to get 11 single_crochet = width 10 cm / 4 size is determined by hook size used uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3931&cid=19
